quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
No pain, no gain.
Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
Success starts with self-discipline.
The body achieves what the mind believes.
Train insane or remain the same.
Your body can stand almost anything. It's your mind you have to convince.
You don't get what you wish for, you get what you work for.
The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
Don't limit your challenges, challenge your limits.
Making excuses burns zero calories per hour.
Wake up. Work out. Kick ass. Repeat.
You are one workout away from a good mood.
When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
The hardest lift of all is lifting your butt off the couch.
Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
The only way to define your limits is by going beyond them.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
Fall in love with the process and the results will come.
A one hour workout is 4% of your day. No excuses.
Train like a beast, look like a beauty.
Your fitness is 100% mental. Your body won't go where your mind doesn't push it.
Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
Don't stop when it hurts, stop when you're done.
The only bad workout is the one you didn't do.
Fitness is like marriage, you can't cheat on it and expect it to work.
The mind is the most important muscle to work.
Sore today, strong tomorrow.
Good things come to those who sweat.
Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
To change your body, you must first change your mind.
Focus on your goal. Don't look in any direction but ahead.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
The only time success comes before work is in the dictionary.
The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
Success is usually the culmination of controlling failure.
Focus on results and you'll never change. Focus on change and you'll get results
Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work gains success. Greatness will come.
Today's efforts are tomorrow's results.
If it doesn't challenge you, it won't change you.
Consistency is key to success.
Transform your life one rep at a time.
Get comfortable with being uncomfortable.
Fitness is not a destination, it's a way of life.
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
Don’t let anyone work harder than you do.
You are stronger than you think.
